entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
